title: Online purchase from Australia
selftext: I ordered clothes from Australia. I‚Äôm from India. Today when i went to collect from my post office they say i have to pay 8k rupees to get it. I already paid 15k above for this purchase. Now i have to pay . Is this customs?  How can i solve this issue? The post office officials say that it‚Äôs to be sent for revaluation and let‚Äôs see. Also there‚Äôs no bill attached to the parcel. Is it because of that ? If i show the bill to the officials, can i not pay the 8k rupees? Please give me a solution.
comments: With customs duty it's a hit or miss. Sometimes they use the table values for the goods coming in and calculate duty on that, sometimes they let it pass without any duty. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
